Good Comments: High-quality encodes and translations that try to capture the spirit of the original. This one-man translation team isn't perfect yet, but is the best way I've found to see Shin-chan in the original Japanese.
Bad Comments: keep it up! it's great to be able to watch this in its' original form - and we even get to see shin's elephant - nice..........lovely work!

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Crayon Shin-chan Gaiden: Alien vs. Shinnosuke

Good Comments: love these guys for doing this! the puns can be hit or miss, but they at least gave it a game try (nothing's harder than trying to translate a japenese pun to english while keeping the humor) - excellent work overall!
